scripts.serve:dev: rm -rf _site && cross-env ELEVENTY_ENV=development DEBUG=Eleventy* npx eleventy --serve | tee ./buildlog.txt
scripts.make:quotes: node -e 'var w = require("./bin/enrichers/quotes.js"); w.writeQuotes().then(() => console.log("complete quotes"))' > ./buildlog.txt
scripts.make:films: node -e 'var w = require("./bin/enrichers/films.js"); w.writeFilms().then(() => console.log("complete films"))' > ./buildlog.txt
scripts.make:tv: node -e 'var w = require("./bin/enrichers/tv.js"); w.writeTVShows().then(() => console.log("complete tv"))' > ./buildlog.txt
scripts.make:songs: node -e 'var w = require("./bin/enrichers/rss-music.js"); w.writeSongs().then(() => console.log("complete write songs"))' > ./buildlog.txt
scripts.make:pocket: node -e 'var w = require("./bin/enrichers/pocket.js"); w.writeAmplify().then(() => console.log("complete write amplify"))' > ./buildlog.txt
scripts.make:books: node -e 'var w = require("./bin/enrichers/books.js"); w.writeBooks().then(() => console.log("complete books"))' > ./buildlog.txt
scripts.set:pocket: npm run make:pocket && git add src/content/amplify/* && git add to-process/ril_export.html && git commit -m "chore: new amplify"
scripts.activate:pocket: node_modules/pocket-auth-cli/bin/pocket-auth $CON_KEY > .env-json.json && total_string="CON_KEY=\"$CON_KEY\"" && echo $total_string > .env && npm run write:pocket-info-access && npm run write:pocket-info-user && node -e 'var w = require("./bin/enrichers/pocket-api.js"); w.writeAmplify()'
scripts.get:pocket: node node_modules/dotenv-cli/cli.js -- npm run activate:pocket && git add src/content/amplify/* && git add pocket-since.txt && git commit -m "chore: new amplify"
scripts.make:readwise: node -e 'var w = require("./bin/enrichers/readwise-reader-api.js"); w.writeAmplify().then(() => console.log("complete write amplify"))' > ./buildlog.txt
scripts.get:readwise: node node_modules/dotenv-cli/cli.js -- npm run make:readwise && git add src/content/amplify/* && git add readwise-since.txt && git commit -m "chore: new amplify"
